name: Re-Egg
description:
Vicious Rabbits stole your eggs! Maybe you shouldn't have put them all into one basket...

Grab your (t)rusty Re-Device, Re-Wind time if necessary and Re-Claim those eggs! Bump a Nest to release an egg, capture it with your Basket. But watch out for the Rabbits hiding in the Nests!

A/D to move left/right, W/Up/Space to jump, R/Backspace to rewind time.
